database.name: VIEW ESCM_MERGEDPROPOSAL_VIEW
database.view: SELECT lines.escm_proposalmgmt_line_id AS escm_mergedproposal_view_id, lines.ad_client_id, lines.ad_org_id, lines.isactive, lines.created, lines.createdby, lines.updated, lines.updatedby, proposal.proposalno, bid.bidno, bp.name AS suppliername, COALESCE(product.name, lines.description) AS productname, lines.movementqty, lines.movementqty - bidlines.awardedqty AS remainingqty, lines.netprice, lines.negot_unit_price, lines.net_unitprice, CASE WHEN bidlines.awardedqty = 0 THEN lines.movementqty - bidlines.awardedqty ELSE lines.awardedqty END AS awardedqty, bid.escm_bidmgmt_id, lines.escm_proposalmgmt_line_id, lines.escm_bidmgmt_line_id, lines.line, lines.escm_proposalmgmt_id FROM escm_proposalmgmt_line lines JOIN escm_proposalmgmt proposal ON proposal.escm_proposalmgmt_id = lines.escm_proposalmgmt_id JOIN escm_bidmgmt bid ON proposal.escm_bidmgmt_id = bid.escm_bidmgmt_id JOIN escm_bidmgmt_line bidlines ON bidlines.escm_bidmgmt_line_id = lines.escm_bidmgmt_line_id JOIN c_bpartner bp ON bp.c_bpartner_id = proposal.supplier LEFT JOIN m_product product ON product.m_product_id = lines.m_product_id WHERE lines.issummarylevel = 'N' AND (proposal.proposalappstatus = 'INC' OR proposal.proposalappstatus = 'REJ') ORDER BY proposal.proposalno, lines.line
